values:
Heh.

<small>[[ooc: Kisame got a hang of one-eye pretty quick, then, hmm? Shaved off Kakashi's lower leg, put on his jangly hat, and is now enjoying a smug walk back from the desert.]]</small>

An eye?

AN EYE!?

Is that ALL YOU COULD MANAGE!?

<lj-cut text="Filtered to Akatsuki">
Mission complete?
</lj-cut>

Have at you, abominable prince! She's my bride now, and there's nothing you can do to stop me!

BWWAAAA~HA~HA~HA~!

Oooh, I can pick them all out, too! Every one of them! Daimyos and peasants, men and women, elders and children, they all have their own taste and smell! This is wonderful!

Why can't we have more curses like this one?

<small>[[ooc: Affected and loving it.]]</small>

<lj-cut text="Filtered to Akatsuki and sympathizers">
When?
</lj-cut>

Aww, looks like the cat's out of the bag.

I GAVE HER A WARNING, WHICH SHE BLATANTLY DISREGARDED.

SHE HAD TO PAY!

[[ooc: Oh my.]]
I told you I would, and I'm a man of my word. You deserved every bit of that. I must say, though, I'm certainly feeling quite relaxed now.

Heh, I almost feel like making a game out of it. Watching everyone scurry about, looking for one they won't find until that person deems it so. Hard to decide whether playing or merely being a spectator would be more enjoyable.

Told you it would do nothing, didn't I, boy? Didn't even need to dirty my hands with this one. Itachi-san is a big boyu, afterall.

<lj-cut text=" Filtered to Akatsuki">
I'd imagine now would be a good time for a meeting, hm?
</lj-cut>

Well, shit. Today's gonna be strange.

<small>[[ooc:Struck? Take a guess. XD]]</small>
What the hell do you mean, 'How do fish fuck?' ?!?

You know what would make my day, seeing as how its been too quiet around here?

Some bloodshed. Any volunteers willing to part with any, let me know.
I want a real home, goddammit, and someone to love me.
I certainly hope my absence hasn't worried anyone. I had things I had to take care of. But rest assured, I'm completely back to my old self. So many new people... hm. This will be fun.

<lj-cut text="Filtered to Akatsuki, old and new">
What's the status of the new recruits?
</lj-cut>

I think I'm almost over it. <s>But... I'm terrified that it will return.</s>

<small>[[ooc: Strikes hackable if you try hard enough]]</small>

<lj-cut text="Private;; Fairly easily hackable, due to state of mind">
Why didn't you kill me?! DAMN YOU! DAMN YOU TO HELL!
</lj-cut>

I... I hear we have open positions here in our ranks. Please, come fill them.
Hn. Executioner. Let him come judge me. I'd almost enjoy the confrontation.

The first person who mentions what happened to me yesterday will find themselves in ribbons.

I hope you're all enjoying your "holiday." Your complacency on a day such as this only makes you an easier target.
[[ooc: Yup. Genderbender Kisame. Have fun. XD]]

I can't find 'Tachi-san kun... and I wanted to play today!

Someone else wanna play with me? I got Sammy! He's really neat!

[[ooc: chibi!Kisame~~ He's about 5.. and in case you didn't know, Sammy is how he'll be refering to Samehada. XD]]

Two days in a row that I've had the pleasure of using my sword to cut down wretched little creatures.

Perhaps this is my Christmas gift?

I pray that you're recovering well, Itachi-san.  What would you have as our next step? Samehada is hungry.

Hotaru-san, thank you for what you've done. I, for one, am in your debt.

Hn.

Just a few broken bones outside of this ankle. Nothing time won't mend. Deidara-san, I certainly hope you came out as unscathed as it had appeared. That Number 18 of yours works wonders.

Itachi-san, your eyes...  

How are we going to approach mending them?


[[ooc: Log coming later today. May already be up by the time you read this. Kisame has several cracked ribs, torn muscles, a hairline fracture in his right leg, and a severly jacked up ankle, courtesy of Tayuya.]]

Hmm... water I can enjoy.  

"Sea monsters" should be fun to play with.

I don't know who the hell you think either of us are, but stay away from my ring.

Itachi-san, is this one of those 'curse days' you spoke of?
And I wouldn't imagine this is part of that brat Uchiha's faulty jutsu, now is it?
